description:
Roberto and Hiraga head to the village of Monte to investigate the mystery surrounding the legend of the Decapitating Clown.
Source: amazon

titles.title: Kubikiri Doukeshi to Solomon no Douwa
L`arlequin fauche-tête et le conte (pour enfants) de Salomon
The Decapitating Clown and the Tale of Solomon
首切り道化師とソロモンの童話
